Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory119.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "I'm out, Miss Luna.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Gabriel reports to Luna, he continues to bombard the cabin walls of the space station with a hand cannon.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Target signal clear. I'm moving in a straight line.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Those people are also in the space station, but they are not our mission target. Avoid contact if possible.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Understood. I'll try to make it quick.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Once the mission is complete, send me the signal immediately.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "...I'll pick you up in person.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The entire space station starts trembling vigorously. The connecting joints between compartments slowly disintegrate, layer by layer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Is this place disintegrating...?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory118.png'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Dear children, we are now demonstrating how the immune system of the human body works—'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Cells infected by bacteria or viruses will be... destroyed and discarded...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The broadcast... Does it mean the space station is self-destructing?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's the self-defense mechanism.", 3: '38', 4: 'I think so.', 5: '38'}
{3: 'After a lot of trembling, you look out from the window. Many compartments have already been tossed into space...'}
{3: 'Some compartments do not have the time to release pressure, and are pushed away instead by their content, including air and Babylonia troops...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Like it said, the immune system of the space station was triggered.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Immune? You mean the immune system of the Corrupted... against humans?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If I'm not wrong...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You destroyed the space station's observation room and weapon control system, which was akin to disabling its attack and defense functions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Now that your troops start to land, they have triggered the immune system "within" the space station.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "To it, a temporary disintegration doesn't necessarily mean destruction...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Because as long as the gravity core still exists, it can attract and restructure nearby matters like it did in the past...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But the integration surely is devastating to us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...If we don't do anything, we will probably end up expunged.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm ready.", 3: '56', 4: "We're not just gonna sit here and wait.", 5: '56'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
